recommendations: ‚Äú If I were to describe Ritesh in three words, they would be: Industrious, organized and reliable. In the time that we worked together at Goodera, I have witnessed him toil hard to not only efficiently turnaround his deliverables well within time but also utilize the remaining time to drastically improve his presentation skills. As a colleague and a friend, Ritesh is extremely caring and resourceful and would often go out of his way to assist me and others in the office with their daily tasks. Ritesh perseveres in the face of the toughest of challenges and is constantly in pursuit of opportunities for self-improvement. Working with an ambitious, hardworking and kind-hearted colleague like Ritesh has been truly inspirational and I am sure he will continue to do that in whichever team he works with.‚Äù Show less
projects: [{"title":"Project Cyrstal","start_date":"Jun 2016","description":"CRYSTAL is an incentive and compensation management system designed to calculate and automate payouts of both on-role and off-role employees of Vodafone India Limited. The application is based on TrueComp Variable Compensation Management Suite, a product of Callidus Software.1. Acted as the Project Manager for end-to-end planning, development, testing and roll-out of the system in 6 circles viz. Kerela, Andhra Pradesh, Chennai, Rest of Tamil Nadu, Delhi and Uttar Pradesh (West). 4 more circles viz. Mumbai, Karnataka, Punjab and Haryana currently in pipeline2. Worked as a SPOC from Vodafone IT for the project acting as a nexus between VIL business teams and other partners"},{"title":"Improvement of Touch-Point Net Promoter Score (NPS) for Vodafone Stores in Tamil Nadu","start_date":"Jul 2015","description":"1. Use of TNPS to understand the expectations and satisfaction level of Vodafone customers in Coimbatore (Chennai and Tamil Nadu Circle)2. Analysis of the results of survey campaigns at various locations (Vodafone Stores and Vodafone Mini Stores) to understand the pattern of TNPS numbers and point the weak links (ventures that generate less revenue and have a low level of customer satisfaction)3. Suggestion and implementation of ideas to boost up the promoters, reduce the number of detractors and improve the overall TNPS of Vodafone Coimbatore"},{"title":"Project Spike","start_date":"Jun 2015"},{"title":"History Construction and Correction of MSCI Equity Base","start_date":"Jan 2015","end_date":"Aug 2015","description":"1. Constructed a historical model that included the pricing details, volumes and identifier changes of all the assets of MSCI Equity Base. The historical data bank was used as a database for many financial models by MSCI.2. Helped in rectification of various data points and removal of redundant data in the historical data model"}]
